    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stone Body Mutagen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1967)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
<trait label="Mutagen" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=116" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 61 <sup>1.1</sup>, [The Fall of Plaguestone](/Sources.aspx?ID=3) pg. 56</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This mutagen calcifies your body, making it as hard as stone. 

**Benefit** You gain resistance to physical damage (except bludgeoning) equal to the listed amount. 

**Drawback** Your Speeds are reduced by 10 feet (to a minimum of 5 feet) and you take a –2 penalty to Reflex saves.
